title: Surrender Vote Vailed 3/0
body: If I was new to this game I would think nobody that works for Riot got past the 2nd grade.

From the [wiki](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Surrendering):
> At least 70% of the team must agree to surrender in order for the vote to pass.

Abstaining from the vote is the same as voting no.  Essentially, 3/5 = 60% < 70%, so the vote failed.

I wasn't trying to bring facts into this. 

I was just stating that if I was new to this game and 3 people voted yes for surrender. 1 was dc and 1 was undecided and it said 

Surrender Vote Fail 3/0 I would think they can't do proper math. 

Rito needs to change it so if 1/2 people DON'T vote or CAN'T vote because dc that it'll automatically assume yes. It's stupid that 3 people want to end a trollish game and can't because 2 undecided voters. 

Especially since it gives duo's all the more troll right over a game

Refusing to vote counts as a no, so that's the same as 3/2. The vote would have passed if you had an afk.

Also, people throw like crazy #LC$B1GPL@YZ lol surrender is pointless the majority of the time anyway. I've been 0/5 as Lucian, vote no to surrender vote, go legendary and end game at 8/5.  Surrendering is a bronze trap because you lose 100% of the games you don't try. You forfeit the ~25% (there was a stat I forgot, I think it's 1/4)  where you're behind and they throw hard. 

Anyone else see 11k gold deficit turn into a 5k gold *lead* in 15 minutes?

Then you have those 2 childish people on duo que that are running into the enemy fountain. Int feeding purposely baiting objectives. etc. All because one didn't like someone else. 

Then what? Not everyone wants to stay with people who ruin the entire game

Well I mean, those games have happened where you carry 4v5s or one person feeds hard so it might as well be a 4v6 and they still manage to lose the game.

But I hope at minimum it's rare that duoqueue Malzahar and Yi botlane (or Panth and Wukong botlane) go 0/12 and make you wonder if some people are born with their heads on backwards. Yeah, those games it's better to cut your losses and ditch@20 instead of wasting another 15 minutes in an inevitable defeat. Ugh I'm tired of those children too.

Requires a Super Majority

Anyone who has done basic high school should understand the concept of voting, mob rules and ways to help combat it
